remarks: A transposition (as a kind of function) is the function transposing the two points it moves.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:
pmtrrn.t $e |- T = ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
pmtrrn.r $e |- R = ran T $.
pmtrfrn.p $e |- P = dom ( F \ _I ) $.
pmtrfrn $p |- ( F e. R -> ( ( D e. _V /\ P C_ D /\ P ~~ 2o ) /\ F = ( T ` P ) ) ) $.
